com.team23.weather.gui

Class MarsForecastPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.team23.weather.gui.MarsForecastPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocaleObserver, ILocationObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MarsForecastPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILocaleObserver, ILocationObserver
    A MarsForecastPanel extends JPanel. A MarsForecastPanel implements the ILocationObserver interface, to listen for location changes. A MarsForecastPanel implements the ILocaleObserver interface, to listen to locale changes. A MarsForecastPanel displays all the weather information from a MarsForecast to the user. This includes the date of the forecast (earth and mars), the minimum and maximum Temperature's, the Pressure, the humidity, the wind Speed, the wind direction, and the sky condition.
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen
    See Also:
    MarsWeatherClient, MarsForecast, WeatherData, JPanel, Serialized Form
